title: I Can’t Wait For Nijigaku’s Live! Part 2
detail_text: <:th_ch0212/>*Huff*, *Huff*.... Phew~, finally~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>We somehow.... did it....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Well done, both of you! Now that you’re done with this practice, we can all stand on our live stage this weekend with confidence.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>I wonder if it’ll be fine, I barely got through it....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Me too. But if Emma-san says so, I’m sure we’ll be alright. I’m glad I was able to clear it at the same time as you, Mia-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Rina! I feel the same way! In fact, I may be even happier.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>That’s one more thing you two have in common♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Hehe, yeah! But we could only do this because you were with us, Emma. So umm.... Thanks.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Fufu, you’re welcome. Let’s all have fun at the live, okay!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I’m looking forward to being on stage with you two, Mia-chan, Emma-san. Rina-chan’s board「Excited」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
